title: How to Make Stir Fried Oatmeal

steps.headline: Mix egg and oatmeal in a bowl to coat oatmeal thoroughly.
Heat butter in large frying pan.
When the butter is sizzling, add oatmeal/egg mixture.
Brown oatmeal until oats are separated, and toasty looking.
When oats are brown, dump in sugar, raisins, walnuts.
Add water.
steps.description: It will sizzle and steam and sound awesome. Stir until water is absorbed.

text: Assemble ingredients.  Mix egg and oatmeal in a bowl to coat oatmeal thoroughly.  Heat butter in large frying pan.  Sauté apples.  When the butter is sizzling, add oatmeal/egg mixture.  Brown oatmeal until oats are separated, and toasty looking. Stir constantly. When oats are brown, dump in sugar, raisins, walnuts.  Sprinkle with cinnamon.  Add water. It will sizzle and steam and sound awesome. Stir until water is absorbed. Serve immediately.
